summary: 1995  was a common year starting on Sunday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Frank Sherwood Rowland  was an American Nobel laureate and a professor of chemistry at the University of California, Irvine. His research was on atmospheric chemistry and chemical kinetics. His best-known work was the discovery that chlorofluorocarbons contribute to ozone depletion.
title: F. Sherwood Rowland
